items.sentence: Didn\'t I ask you not to see my daughter anymore?
Tom said he would\'ve come if he\'d been invited.
Tom is the only one who knows how anything works.
Tom is the only one who remained awake all night.
I\'m pretty certain that Tom can\'t speak French.
Now that I\'m here, everything\'s going to be OK.
People Tom\'s age don\'t make new friends easily.
Tom has lived in Boston for the last three years.
Tom has something he neeeds to do this afternoon.
Tom grabbed a chair and threw it across the room.
